popular.title: Dyslexia support
popular.description: Empowering individuals to read with ease, by providing the option to switch between 15+ customizable fonts, including OpenDyslexic, Lexend, on any web page.

popular.title: Text to Speech
popular.description: Helperbird reads web pages, ebooks, and PDFs aloud with natural voices and offers 20 voice options.

popular.title: Reading Mode
popular.description: Helperbirds' Reading Mode improves your browsing experience by removing ads and distractions from web pages, and allowing complete customization.

popular.title: PDF support
popular.description: Transform your PDF reading experience with Helperbird's accessibility features, including immersive reader support.

popular.title: Dyslexia Ruler
popular.description: Improve your reading experience with Helperbird's dyslexia ruler, featuring line focus and reading guide support for enhanced focus and understanding.

popular.title: Immersive Reader
popular.description: Experience the power of enhanced reading comprehension with Immersive Reader by Microsoft in Helperbird, available for use on Google Docs and PDFs.

tools.title: Reading Mode
tools.description: Helperbirds' Reading Mode improves your browsing experience by removing ads and distractions from web pages, and allowing complete customization.

tools.title: Dyslexia Fonts
tools.description: Empowering individuals to read with ease, by providing the option to switch between 15+ customizable fonts, including OpenDyslexic, Lexend, on any web page.

tools.title: Dyslexia Ruler
tools.description: Improve your reading experience with Helperbird's dyslexia ruler, featuring line focus and reading guide support for enhanced focus and understanding.

tools.title: Highlighter
tools.description: Highlight any paragraph or text on a website. Any colour you want. Super handy for studying and revision. Pdf support is coming next month.

tools.title: Styles & Themes
tools.description: Change background, highlight & font colors to help with focus and improve reading.

tools.title: Overlays
tools.description: A colour overlay is available to help those with Irlen Syndrome or those who dislike a web page's base colour but don't want to change it entirely.

tools.title: Color blindness
tools.description: Color blindness features including Emphasize Links and stroke text

tools.title: Dictionary
tools.description: Quickly look up word definitions with audio pronunciation as you browse the web, including synonyms, Etymology and related words.

tools.title: Privacy
tools.description: We never sell, store, or consume any user data. We do not store data or any other user-related content.

tools.title: Text to Speech
tools.description: Turn text into lifelike natural speech. Helperbird can read aloud the content of any web pages, ebooks and PDFs with natural sounding voices.

tools.title: Voice typing
tools.description: Type text using your voice. Speak using your voice, and it will be typed into a notepad where you can edit it.

tools.title: Notes
tools.description: Save and manage snippets of text, images, websites and videos using the notes feature.

tools.title: Translate any page
tools.description: Translate any website or any snippet of text with Helperbird. Over 100 languages, all with one click.

tools.title: Screenshot
tools.description: Take screenshots in your browser the easy way. Screenshot any page your viewing. All in one click.

tools.title: Page & text magnifier
tools.description: Page & text magnifier allows you to manage zoom options more precisely.

tools.title: Cursor control
tools.description: Make your mouse pointer more visible. Customize mouse cursor with sizes.

tools.title: Immersive Reader
tools.description: Select text, right-click, and Microsoft's Immersive Reader will help you read it. Including Google docs, PDFs & ebooks.

tools.title: Adjust letters and words
tools.description: Adjust letter and word spacing, font size and line-height according to your needs.

tools.title: Full document editor
tools.description: Create, edit and delete documents in a full editor. Export and import to Google docs, Markdown and more.

tools.title: PDF support
tools.description: Use immersive reader, text to speech and more on PDF files.

tools.title: Google docs support
tools.description: Change fonts, immersive reader, text to speech and more on any Google docs file.

tools.title: Extract text from images. (OCR)
tools.description: A powerful optical character recognition (OCR) extension to capture and convert images, videos, PDFs  to text.

tools.title: Read it later
tools.description: Helperbirds Bookmark Manager that helps with Organization, Syncing across browsers and platforms.

tools.title: Annotate web pages
tools.description: Highlight or annotate web pages documents, PDFs, ebooks and more content to improve engagement and study.

tools.title: Analyze
tools.description: Quickly find the number of characters, letters and breakdowns of all sentences on a webpage.

tools.title: Reading guide
tools.description: Reading ruler, useful when you are reading long texts on the web.

tools.title: Line Focus
tools.description: Quickly find the number of characters, letters and breakdowns of all sentences on a webpage.

tools.title: Shortcuts
tools.description: Access Helperbird features with keyboard shortcuts.

tools.title: Summarize
tools.description: Helperbird automatically summarizes the web page into bullet points.
